Dental.title: Comprehensive Dental Insurance
Dental.description: Covers preventive care, cleanings, fillings, and major procedures including root canals and crowns.

Dental.title: Emergency Dental Care
Dental.description: Immediate access to emergency dental services for urgent issues like severe pain or trauma.

Mental Health.title: Employee Assistance Program (EAP)
Mental Health.description: Free confidential counseling sessions with licensed therapists for stress, anxiety, and personal issues.

Mental Health.title: Mental Health Coverage
Mental Health.description: Comprehensive mental health benefits including therapy, psychiatry, and medication management.

Vision.title: Annual Eye Exam Coverage
Vision.description: Full coverage for annual comprehensive eye examinations and vision screenings.

Vision.title: Eyewear Allowance
Vision.description: Allowance for prescription glasses, contact lenses, and frames from network providers.

OPD.title: Outpatient Department Coverage
OPD.description: Coverage for outpatient consultations, diagnostic tests, and minor procedures.

OPD.title: Telemedicine Services
OPD.description: 24/7 access to virtual consultations with licensed physicians for non-emergency health concerns.
